title: Tenkuu Senki Shurato: Sousei e no Anto
alternative_title: Heaven Wars Shurato OVA, Tenku Senki Shurato: Sosei he no Anto, 天空戦記シュラト　創世への暗闘
description: A 16-year-old boy named Shurato and his friend Gai happen to be drawn into a gigantic ball of light while competing in the final match of a martial arts tournament. When they regain their senses, they find themselves transferred to a mystic heavenly sphere with a divine atmosphere. It's soon discovered that Shurato used to be the governing king of this world and that he has only been brought to his original state. Shurato is shocked as Gai suddenly turns hostile. After this unfortunate incident, a spectacular yet fantastic drama develops involving the two.
